result.execSummary:
Angel N Thomas was extradited to another county, state or jurisdiction. Extradition means Angel N Thomas was accused or convicted of an offense in another county, state or jurisdiction and was taken there to face their charge(s) or conviction.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Angel N Thomas

defendant.name: Thomas, Angel N
defendant.address: 415 S Bird Street, Sun Prairie, WI 53590

records.addlTxt: Review hearing on May 16, 2022 at 09:30 am.
signed in the courtroom by defendant.

09:36 AM Defendant Angel N Thomas in court, in custody, with attorney Luis Daniel Gutierrez.   Atty Will appeared for the State of Wisconsin.    Victim rights have been complied with by the Waukesha County District Attorneys Office.
Atty Gutierrez states his client wishes to waive extradition. 
State does not object. 
Angel Thomas waives extradition and signs paperwork. 
State requests bail revoked and hold for authorities. 
Bail has not been set in this matter.  Review hearing scheduled for May 16, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Extradition hearing on April 14, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Defendant's Demand for Discovery and Inspection.
records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: Attorney Luis Gutierrez appointed counsel by Public Defender's Office
for Warrant for Commitment signed by Judge Bugenhagen.
Motion hearing on April 11, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

10:19 AM Defendant Angel N Thomas in court, in custody, with attorney Luis Daniel Gutierrez.    District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Atty Gutierrez makes a statement as to the extradition in this matter. 
Atty Gutierrez states they are contesting extradition in this matter. 
Atty Gutierrez makes a bail motion in this matter. 
State objects to any bail modification. 
Court declines to set bail at this matter.  Motion hearing scheduled for April 11, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

10:19 AM Defendant Angel N Thomas in court, in custody.   District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Public defender did evaluate the defendant and is eligable but they have not appointed counsel as of yet. 
Court will set a new date in this matter to have them appoint counsel. 
  Defendant to comply with I.D. Processing.
Court will address bail at the next hearing.  Hearing scheduled for March 21, 2022 at 10:15 am.
Appointment of Counsel Report filed by Public Defender's Office
Bail/bond hearing on March 17, 2022 at 09:30 am.

03:14 PM Defendant Angel N Thomas in court, in custody, with attorney Amanda Marie Nimmer.   Christian Farina appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defense acknowledges receipt of complaint and affidavit/warrant from the State of Pennsylvania and waives reading of complaint and affidavit/warrant.  The Court is going to deny bail and remand the defendant to the Waukesha County Jail.  Attorney Nimmer is asking a quick date before the Trial Court and to also address bail.  The Court will schedule this matter before the Trial Court as soon as possible as well as set it for a bail hearing.  Defendant to comply with I.D. Processing.  Hearing scheduled for March 17, 2022 at 09:30 am.  Bail/bond hearing scheduled for March 17, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Affidavit/Warrant from the State of Pennsylvania
